title: List migration subtasks
description: Lists all the subtasks for a given BigQuery migration workflow.

objective.narrative: This sample addresses the need for detailed observability into a BigQuery migration. When a migration workflow runs slowly or encounters an error, developers can list the subtasks to get a granular view of the job's progress. This allows them to pinpoint the exact step causing the issue, which is essential for debugging and effective progress tracking.

regionTags.name: bigquerymigration_v2alpha_migrationservice_migrationsubtasks_list
regionTags.title: List migration subtasks
regionTags.description: Lists all the subtasks for a given BigQuery migration workflow.
